rules:
    components-security-schemes-pascal-case:
        description: All security schemes should be named with UpperCamelCase
        message: {{property}} is not UpperCamelCase. {{description}}. Fix by renaming the definition, eg. object -> Object.
        given: $.components.securitySchemes
        severity: error
            field: @key
            function: casing
                type: pascal
                    char: .
                    allowLeading: false
